Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Batch
Assembly:
Azure.Batch.dll

The JobSpecification of a CloudJobSchedule.

Edit

In this Article

    Implements ITransportObjectProvider(Of JobSpecification), IPropertyMetadata, IModifiable, IReadOnly

JobSpecification(PoolInformation) JobSpecification(PoolInformation)

Edit

Initializes a new instance of the JobSpecification class.

public JobSpecification(PoolInformation poolInformation)Public Sub New(poolInformation As PoolInformation)
Parameters
poolInformation
PoolInformation PoolInformation

The pool on which the Batch service runs the tasks of jobs created via this JobSpecification.

Properties

CommonEnvironmentSettings CommonEnvironmentSettings

Edit

Gets or sets a list of common environment variable settings.

public IList<EnvironmentSetting> CommonEnvironmentSettings { get; set; }Public Property CommonEnvironmentSettings As IList(Of EnvironmentSetting)
Value
IList<EnvironmentSetting> IList(Of EnvironmentSetting)

Remarks

These environment variables are set for all tasks in jobs created under this CloudJobSchedule (including the Job Manager, Job Preparation and Job Release tasks).

Constraints Constraints

Edit

Gets or sets the execution constraints for jobs created via this JobSpecification.

public JobConstraints Constraints { get; set; }Public Property Constraints As JobConstraints
Value
JobConstraints JobConstraints

DisplayName DisplayName

Edit

Gets or sets a display name for all jobs created via this JobSpecification.

public string DisplayName { get; set; }Public Property DisplayName As String
Value
String String

JobManagerTask JobManagerTask

Edit

Gets or sets details of a Job Manager task to be launched when a job is created via this JobSpecification.

public JobManagerTask JobManagerTask { get; set; }Public Property JobManagerTask As JobManagerTask
Value
JobManagerTask JobManagerTask

JobPreparationTask JobPreparationTask

Edit

Gets or sets the Job Preparation task for jobs created via this JobSpecification.

public JobPreparationTask JobPreparationTask { get; set; }Public Property JobPreparationTask As JobPreparationTask
Value
JobPreparationTask JobPreparationTask

Remarks

The Batch service will run the Job Preparation task on a compute node before starting any tasks of that job on that compute node.

JobReleaseTask JobReleaseTask

Edit

Gets or sets the Job Release task for jobs created via this JobSpecification. 

public JobReleaseTask JobReleaseTask { get; set; }Public Property JobReleaseTask As JobReleaseTask
Value
JobReleaseTask JobReleaseTask

Remarks

The Batch service runs the Job Release task when the job ends, on each compute node where any task of the job has run.

Metadata Metadata

Edit

Gets or sets a list of name-value pairs associated with jobs created via this JobSpecification as metadata.

public IList<MetadataItem> Metadata { get; set; }Public Property Metadata As IList(Of MetadataItem)
Value
IList<MetadataItem> IList(Of MetadataItem)

OnAllTasksComplete OnAllTasksComplete

Edit

Gets or sets the action the Batch service should take when all tasks in the job are in the Completed state.

public OnAllTasksComplete? OnAllTasksComplete { get; set; }Public Property OnAllTasksComplete As OnAllTasksComplete?
Value
Nullable<OnAllTasksComplete> Nullable(Of OnAllTasksComplete)

OnTaskFailure OnTaskFailure

Edit

Gets or sets the action the Batch service should take when any task in the job fails.

public OnTaskFailure? OnTaskFailure { get; set; }Public Property OnTaskFailure As OnTaskFailure?
Value
Nullable<OnTaskFailure> Nullable(Of OnTaskFailure)

Remarks

A task is considered to have failed if it completes with a non-zero exit code and has exhausted its retry count, or if it had a scheduling error.

PoolInformation PoolInformation

Edit

Gets or sets the pool on which the Batch service runs the tasks of jobs created via this JobSpecification.

public PoolInformation PoolInformation { get; set; }Public Property PoolInformation As PoolInformation
Value
PoolInformation PoolInformation

Priority Priority

Edit

Gets or sets the priority of jobs created via this JobSpecification.

public int ? Priority { get; set; }Public Property Priority As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

Remarks

Priority values can range from -1000 to 1000, with -1000 being the lowest priority and 1000 being the highest priority.

UsesTaskDependencies UsesTaskDependencies

Edit

Gets or sets whether tasks in jobs created under this CloudJobSchedule can define dependencies on each other.

public bool ? UsesTaskDependencies { get; set; }Public Property UsesTaskDependencies As Boolean?
Value
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

Remarks

The default value is false.
